description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken With Parmesan Wedges recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Chicken With Parmesan Wedges Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer chicken to a serving plate and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Drain cooking juices from roasting pan, leaving 2 tbs in pan. Place pan over medium heat and bring to the boil. Sprinkle with flour and whisk to combine. Gradually add apple juice and 1 cup of water, whisking until mixture comes to the boil and thickens. Add mustard, salt and pepper. Serve chicken with potatoes, carrots and gravy.
